suppress.notes: FP per issue #5213, CVEs for scripting pet projects
cpe:/a:yaml_project:yaml is a YAML implementation in Go #5233 and #5234

FP per issue #5772 - taking into account same FP-risk for other RestEasy microprofile libraries retain this one and remove the following FP-automation suppression rule when merging into bundled suppressions
hand-curated better suppression for FP per issue #5797
hand-curated better FP suppression rule for issue #5794 to be replacing the autmatic FP-OPS flow suppression that will follow behind it when taking it over to the bundled suppression-file
FP per issue #5854 akka-grpc libraries are not part of the akka actor system
FP per issue #5855; akka-persistence-r2dbc is not part of the akka actor system projects
FP per issues #5857, #5856; akka-projection projects are not part of the akka actor system projects

Optimized suppression for FP per issue #5859 The suppression following this for the same FP issue from FP-report automation bot can be discarded when bringing the suppressions into the package suppressions file.
FP per issue #5915 - suppress the CVE only to avoid clash when cpe:/a:vmware:spring were to get broader use
hand-curated better suppression for FP per issues #6626, #7015, #7019, #7020, #7021, #7022
FP per issue #6438 only pkg:maven/org.clojure:clojure@.* is the CPE cpe:/a:clojure:clojure
FP per issue #6757 + manual improvement for related. NOTE: the additional colon in the CPE is required to not match on prefix
FP per issue #5945 + manual improvement for related NOTE: the additional colon in the CPE is required to not match on prefix
cpe:/a:services_project:services is Drupal services module in PHP #6448

FP per issue #6981 - manual addition prometheus java_client libraries seen as the prometheus server, but they would receive product client_java (no CPE yet, but observed from the existing CPE for the go client client_go)

Original suppression as per #952 suppressed individual CVEs. As per false negative #7057 MySQL java connector has CPEs of its own, so it's proper to suppress the server CPE NOTE: the additional colon in the CPE is required to not match on prefix with cpe:/a:mysql:mysql_connector_j etc
FP per issue #7226 NPM node-windows sudowin sudo.exe binary is not Linux sudo project, but https://github.com/akutz/sudowin
Optimized suppression for FP per issue #4948, #4949, #5017, #5497, #5854, #5857, #7123 as suggested in #7250. If it's not in the io.grpc groupId it's not gRPC itself

FPs original report for private libs: #2995 Additional public libs affected by the same reported in #7251 The sms:sms (Linux SMS package) is not a Java library so it will never appear on the Maven repository
